text: "I Want Love" is a 2001 song by Elton John. It was taken from his 26th studio album Songs from the West Coast. It went to the top 10 in the United Kingdom and Canada and made number 49 in New Zealand, number 14 in Italy and number 31 in Switzerland and the Netherlands. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2002. Robert Downley Jr. is in the music video. ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Elton John songs
title: I Want Love
